card_text: You can target 1 face-up "Inzektor" monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster, that monster's original ATK becomes 2400. If this card is sent to the GY while equipped to a monster: You can target 1 "Inzektor" monster in your GY except "Inzektor Giga-Mantis"; Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Inzektor Giga-Mantis" once per turn.
